mapper.sql: ID, DELETED, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_USER, DEL_REASON, FIRST_INSERT, LAST_MODIFIED, SYMBOL, `NAME`, CONTRACT_ADDRESS, STATUS,TOTAL, FILE_PATH,DEFAULT_PASSWORD,FILE_NAME,PASSWORD,`TYPE`,NODE_ID
mapper.insert: insert into TBL_WALLET_CURRENCY (ID, DELETED, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_USER, DEL_REASON, FIRST_INSERT, LAST_MODIFIED, SYMBOL, `NAME`, CONTRACT_ADDRESS ,STATUS ,TOTAL,FILE_PATH,DEFAULT_PASSWORD,FILE_NAME,PASSWORD,`TYPE`,NODE_ID ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstInsert,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{total,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update TBL_WALLET_CURRENCY set DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_REASON = #{delReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIRST_INSERT = #{firstInsert,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_MODIFIED = #{lastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYMBOL = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTRACT_ADDRESS = #{contractAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL = #{total,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_PATH = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFAULT_PASSWORD = #{defaultPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `TYPE` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NODE_ID = #{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select from TBL_WALLET_CURRENCY where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DELETED = '0'
select from TBL_WALLET_CURRENCY where STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DELETED = '0'

select c.* from TBL_WALLET_CURRENCY c INNER JOIN TBL_WALLET_ACCOUNT_CURRENCY ac on c.DELETED = '0' and ac.DELETED = '0' and c.ID = ac.CURRENCY_ID and ac.ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by c.ID
